# Cross Lagged Panel Modelle

```{r}
library(lavaan)
library(haven)
library(semPlot)

# read complete data
data_star <- read_spss("data/STAR_Students.sav")

# read selected variables
data_star_selected_variables <- 
    read_spss("data/data_star_selected_variables.sav")

clp0_mod <- "
g3tmathss ~ g2tmathss
g3readbsraw ~ g2readbsraw

g3tmathss ~ g2readbsraw
g3readbsraw ~ g2tmathss
"
clp0_fit <- sem(clp0_mod, data = data_star)

semPaths(clp0_fit, what = "std", fade = F)

parameterEstimates(clp0_fit, standardized = T)
```


```{r}
library(lavaan)

clp0_mod <- "
g3tmathss ~ g2tmathss
g3selfconcraw ~ g2selfconcraw

g3tmathss ~ g2selfconcraw
g3selfconcraw ~ g2tmathss
"
clp0_fit <- sem(clp0_mod, data = data_star)

semPaths(clp0_fit, what = "std", fade = F)
```
